title: How to get ink out of clothes that have been dried - Quora
tags: Tips and Hacks for Everyday Life

response.answer_text: Try a pre wash, let sit five minutes, add non chlorine bleach, let set another five minutes and wash on soak cycle cold water.

It's inevitable to get rid of ink stains on clothes after drying but have a solution to remove the stain like hair spray. you must to do is squirt the stain with hair spray and the pen marks/ink should come right off.
